segments.text: May I help you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I want to buy a VCR .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we have many models to choose from here.Do you have a particular brand you want ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . I only want it to be a very good one . The best.It ' s a graduation gift for my son .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . And does your son have a VCR now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , he uses our VCR at home.But he's going to university in the Fall , so he needs his own VCR .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does he watch a lot of movies ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , he sure does.In fact , he wants to become a movie producer himself.He wants to study film at the university .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would like to make a suggestion then , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If your son wants to study film , probably he will start to collect movies himself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I know that . So I want him to have a good VCR to use .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I suggest you consider buying him a DVD player instead ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: DVD ? Isn't that like a CD ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is very similar . The technology is the same .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why is a DVD better than a VCR ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For one thing , sir , the quality of the image is usually better.That ' s because it's digital .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But isn't it more expensive ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is a little more expensive , sir.But there is one important advantage which your son might appreciate .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What's that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If your son starts to buy video tapes , he can't keep them very long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And why not ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Video tape breaks down after fifteen years.So if he collects a lot of tapes , after fifteen years they will all start to rot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . Is that true ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is , sir .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . And what about DVDs ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is the excellent thing about DVDs.If your son starts to collect DVDs , they will last forever . They will never rot .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hmm . He might really appreciate that . I know he will start to collect movies at school . Especially if he studies film .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So let me show you some of our DVD players.In my opinion , DVD is the wave of the future .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , please show me what you have .
segments.speaker: S2
